name: Basharat Aybak
story: Basharat Aybak grew up in a small village in rural Iran. After graduating from high school, he joined the Iranian military and served for several years before being recruited by the OPFOR as a missile specialist. He is married and has two children, whom he misses dearly while on duty. Basharat is a reserved and loyal soldier, committed to his duties and always striving to improve his skills.
